topics.body:
Okay so Goku is a kid again

Wait a second

So Dende says that they didn't know the Black Star Balls were being kept there
Yet Popo knows that when they are wished upon they spread away off the planet?
And Piccolo never showed Dende the balls? Doesn't he have Kami's memories?
And why does Goku instantly give up when he learns the balls left Earth, he's traveled in space before
And how do they know the balls left earth, did someone wish on them before?
Who, what was the wish, how did they get them back

OMG THIS IS STUPID
I AM ON THE FIRST EPISODE
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

Tumblr is just an argument trap waiting to happen. So I stay away from any of that stuff and go to all the fun things.
